name: Million Lords
description:
“Millions Lords is a mobile strategy game unlike any others, with a strong emphasis on combat and conquering, and a season-based leaderboard progression. Unlike other conquest games, you don’t have to spend hours upon hours upgrading buildings and manually-creating armies." Bluestacks.com

Conquer the cities of other players, defend your territory against invaders and plan for your ultimate victory: seating on the throne of the Three Lands!

MAIN FEATURES:
- No city building, no farming, or timer!
Original and unique strategy gameplay.
- Online multiplayer:
Team up and plan organized attacks with your clan!
- An RPG skill tree:
Choose between 10 talents to strengthen your skills.
- 60 craftables items:
To adapt your strategy in real-time!
- A procedural and persistent world:
The Three Lands never stops evolving!

PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS
- Make friends in Million Lords and create the greatest clan together!
- Fight for your brotherhood and be a rightful leader!

COMPETITIVE MMO
- In Million Lords, everything is about conquest and empowerment!
- Expand your territory beyond all expectations: the only border is your determination.

TIP THE SCALES
- Every month, we will crown a new player and it could be you!
- Start fresh like everyone at the beginning of each season: keep your obtained gears and try to climb the leaderboard!

SPECIALIZE AND IMPROVE YOUR STRATEGY
- Choose your skills and create your own Lord: your hero, your choice!
- Specialize your kingdom and hero in resources, army, gold production or other paths to face the enemy!
